body.name: Toyota Gazoo Racing TS050 Hybrid
body.spec: -Reproduce the body form in pursuit of aerodynamics as well as a number of aero devices as it is a real vehicle.

body.name: Mercedes AMG GT3
body.spec: -The cockpit surrounded by the roll cage reproduces equipment specific to the racing machine such as basket seat and steering wheel.

body.name: Ford GT
body.spec: -Model the vehicle's unique configuration, such as the characteristic low but wide overall form connecting the roof and the rear fender [Batless], the air tunnel on the door side, and aerodynamic processing on the underside of the vehicle.

body.name: LaFerrari Yellow Version
body.spec: -Molding La Ferrari body parts in yellow.

body.name: Ferrari F10 Italian GP
body.spec: -F1 car 1978 Round 8 is Brabham, was introduced to the Swedish GP. Exterior parts, such as wing.
